its not an app, its just a keyword used to troubleshoot my firefox
should be ran at login, not startup
the startup stuff starts before the login screen. There is a list of use apps which run at logon too, the startup stuff runs as root
if it needs root then add it to /etc/rc.local    above the exit 0 line. If its a command to run after login add a reference to it in System -> preferences -> Startup items
no , it must be run as regular user. Thanks. You Helped me a lot.
